thread.title: BRIEF-Sensient Technologies Q4 Revenue $328.9 Mln Versus $330.2 Mln

title: BRIEF-Sensient Technologies Q4 Revenue $328.9 Mln Versus $330.2 Mln
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Sensient Technologies Corp:
* ORATION REPORTS RESULTS FOR THE QUARTER AND YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017
* SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.70 TO $3.90 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.84 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.31 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 REVENUE $328.9 MILLION VERSUS $330.2 MILLION * SENSIENT TECHNOLOGIES - IMPACT OF 2017 TAX LEGISLATION ON NET EARNINGS WAS $18.4 MILLION, OR 42 CENTS PER SHARE, IN BOTH CURRENT QUARTER AND FULL YEAR OF 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
